Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.match

Class CookieMatcher

java.lang.Object
org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<Cookie>
io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.match.CookieMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<Cookie>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public class CookieMatcher extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<Cookie>
Hamcrest matcher used to match Ersatz request cookie instances.

    • cookieMatcher

      public static CookieMatcher cookieMatcher(Consumer<CookieMatcher> consumer)
      Configures the cookie matcher with a consumer which is passed a CookieMatcher instance to configure.
      Parameters:
      consumer - the configuration consumer
      Returns:
      the configured matcher

    • value

      public CookieMatcher value(String val)
      Applies a matcher for the specified cookie value. This is equivalent to calling value(Matchers.equalTo('some value')).
      Parameters:
      val - the value string
      Returns:
      a reference to the matcher being configured
